### Steps to reproduce
Open link. View code

message is: "why?"

why? this happens? why watch method is called?

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "微信中右上角游览器打开" (#1940) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://jdfdcc.github.io/vue-mobile-mint/index.html#/baseHome](https://jdfdcc.github.io/vue-mobile-mint/index.html#/baseHome)

### Steps to reproduce
在IOS微信中打开点击推荐商品列表进入商品详情页面然后点击右上角在safary中打开

### What is expected?
应该打开商品详情页

### What is actually happening?
打开的依然是商品列表页面

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "component have their own vue-router instance to control children router" (#1943) at vuejs/vue-router
Closed issue "Why not redirect automatically but add a extra param manually in the last redirec?" (#1942) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
At , [#1938](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router/issues/1938) ,I said the router can't redirect to the page I want . and @posva  said I should add a param in the last redirect as well. I tried it , and succeed But I want to say , I  did assign the params "bigCata" in the pre redirect , why not redirect automatically but add a extra param manually in the last redirect?

### What does the proposed API look like?
Automatically redirect to the page I want.

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "component have their own vue-router instance to control children router" (#1943) at vuejs/vue-router

Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
At , [#1938](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router/issues/1938) ,I said the router can't redirect to the page I want . and @posva  said I should add a param in the last redirect as well. I tried it , and succeed But I want to say , I  did assign the params "bigCata" in the last redirect , why not redirect automatically but add a extra param manually in the last redirec?

### What does the proposed API look like?
Automatically redirect to the page I want.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Cant redirect continuously when the path is dynamic" (#1938) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody: ### Version 3.0.1 ### Reproduction link [https://codepen.io/wangyi7099/pen/JMdRYq](https://codepen.io/wangyi7099/pen/JMdRYq) ### Steps to reproduce As I want to set the default render component when the parent component was rendered. so I use redirect to redirect to the component I want to render for the default. But it seems not to work, when I want to redirect component continuously when the path is dynamic.And the console shows the warning:" [vue-router] missing param for redirect route with path "/:bigCata/smallCata": Expected "bigCata" to be defined" ### What is expected? The default components can be rendered. When I click the `````` -> redirect to the path:"/index/bigCata/smallCata" ### What is actually happening? It doesn't redirect to the smallCata..

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Adding children and parent to currentRoute" (#1941) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
Also adding .vscode (IDE settings file) to .gitignore

@posva I'd like to have the feature #1650 was trying to add but it looks like there are too many unrelated changes in that PR and it hasn't been updated with your comments for a little while so I decided to try re-work it here. Thank you for your consideration.
